mapper.insert: /* MenuBoardMapper.insertMenuBoard */ INSERT INTO MENU_BOARD (MENU_DAY, MENU_MSG, USE_YN, REG_USER, REG_DT) VALUES (#{menuDay}, #{menuMsg}, 'Y', 'admin', SYSDATE())
mapper.select:
/* MenuBoardMapper.selectMenuBoardList */ SELECT A.MENU_BOARD_SEQ , A.MENU_DAY , A.MENU_MSG , A.USE_YN , A.REG_USER , A.REG_DT , A.UPT_USER , A.UPT_DT FROM MENU_BOARD A
WHERE A.MENU_DAY BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY) AND DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 4 WEEK) + INTERVAL 4 DAY AND USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY A.MENU_DAY

/* MenuBoardMapper.selectMenuBoardDetail */ SELECT A.MENU_BOARD_SEQ , A.MENU_DAY , A.MENU_MSG , A.USE_YN , A.REG_USER , A.REG_DT , A.UPT_USER , A.UPT_DT FROM MENU_BOARD A WHERE MENU_BOARD_SEQ = #{menuBoardSeq}
